description: Create a flavour sensation with this rosemary and thyme infused herb oil. A great Christmas gift idea, it's perfect for dipping or adding to pizza and salads.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Herb Oil Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rosemary, thyme and oil in a bowl. Store in a sterilised glass jar at room temperature for up to two months. Top up oil if rosemary becomes exposed during use.
